models.Description: Used NER (en_ner_bc5cdr_md) to extract symptoms, MiniLM embeddings word-by-word, FAISS DB with cosine similarity for top‑K matching.

Added biomedical NER filtering (biomedical-ner-all) with advanced text cleaning, lemmatization, and medical relevance filtering. MiniLM embeddings stored in FAISS with weighted multi-symptom cosine similarity for improved top‑K disease matching.
